document.full_text: the miami supporting cast helped the heat survive one final run from the philadelphia 76ers to hold on for a 97-91 victory on wednesday that advanced them to the next round of the nba's playoffs.
document.title: heat and thunder win opening playoff rounds
lines_and_colors: the miami supporting cast helped the heat survive one final run from the philadelphia 76ers to hold on for a 97-91 victory on wednesday that advanced them to the next round of the nba's playoffs.
